name: Harebell & The Mystery Misty
description:
Harebell is trying to find out what's going on inside the mist which suddenly appeared a week ago.

This game was made for a game jam, with the purpose of motivating myself  to build my own game engine, there was no time for a windows version, much less for a web port. There's a video tho.

Credits:

Me (programmer)

Golpelha (art)

Graveler28 (rock smith, he made the rocks/stones you find lying around in the game)

Free Assets

jump.wav https://opengameart.org/content/8-bit-jump-1

spell.wav https://opengameart.org/content/spell-1

creepy1.mp3 https://opengameart.org/content/mystical-theme

creepy2.mp3 https://opengameart.org/content/titan-powerplant

Some of the sounds and/or music was created by David McKee (VIRiX Dreamcore) https://opengameart.org/content/ui-sfx-pack-2-sample
